entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers early this morning then sunny. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
